>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/people/{userid}/photo"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a photo of the user with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"userid","in":"path","description":"The user ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"9846"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The request parameters for updating a photo.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"files":{"type":"string","description":"The avatar photo URL.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for updating a photo.","title":"UpdatePhotoMemberRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated thumbnail parameters: original photo, retina, maximum size photo, big, medium, small","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"object","properties":{"original":{"type":"string","description":"The thumbnail original photo.","nullable":true,"example":"default_user_photo_size_1280-1280.png"},"retina":{"type":"string","description":"The thumbnail retina.","nullable":true,"example":"default_user_photo_size_360-360.png"},"max":{"type":"string","description":"The thumbnail maximum size photo.","nullable":true,"example":"default_user_photo_size_200-200.png"},"big":{"type":"string","description":"The thumbnail big size photo.","nullable":true,"example":"default_user_photo_size_82-82.png"},"medium":{"type":"string","description":"The thumbnail medium size photo.","nullable":true,"example":"default_user_photo_size_48-48.png"},"small":{"type":"string","description":"The thumbnail small size photo.","nullable":true,"example":"default_user_photo_size_32-32.png"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The thumbnails data parameters.","title":"ThumbnailsDataDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"ThumbnailsDataWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"No permissions to perform this action"},"404":{"description":"User not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
